text:
Panorama Education | Senior Software Engineer, Full-Stack Engineer | Boston, MA | Full-time, ONSITE

We're a team of former educators, engineers, designers, and leaders on a mission to improve K-12 education systems for students.

Over the past five years, we have seen how data play a powerful role in improving school climate and culture, teaching and learning, family and community engagement, and students' social-emotional learning. We believe in supporting schools and districts from beginning to endâ€”from administering surveys and conducting data analysis, to providing hands-on coaching and support.
